#summary Installation
#labels Phase-Deploy

= InstallIt =

Assuming all requirements are installed and working properly...

  # Create a work directory
{{{
mkdir workspace
cd workspace
}}}
  # Fetch UnicodeIt and UnicodeItLinux source code (check http://www.svenkreiss.com/UnicodeIt for the latest version of UnicodeIt library). For instance, using wget from the command line
{{{
wget http://www.phyordia.com/projects/unicodeitlinux/src/unicodeitlinux_v0.1.zip
wget http://www.svenkreiss.com/wiki/images/d/d2/unicodeIt06py.zip
}}}
  # Unzip and set correct permissions
{{{
unzip unicodeitlinux_v0.1.zip -d .
unzip UnicodeIt06py.zip -d unicodeitlinux_v0.1
chmod +x unicodeitlinux_v0.1/unicodeitlinux.py
}}}
